org.hps.test.it

Class ClustererTest

  • java.lang.Object
    • junit.framework.Assert
      • junit.framework.TestCase
        • org.hps.test.it.ClustererTest
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    junit.framework.Test

    public class ClustererTest
extends junit.framework.TestCase
    This test performs basic sanity checks on the output from the various clustering algorithms, and it creates an AIDA file with some useful plots, as well as optionally writes an LCIO file with the event data plus the clusters.
    See Also:
    Clusterer, Cluster, CalorimeterHit

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      (package private) static class  ClustererTest.ClusterCheckDriver
      Driver that performs test assertions on Cluster collections.
      (package private) static class  ClustererTest.ClustererTestConfig 
      (package private) static class  ClustererTest.ClusterPlotsDriver
      This Driver produces some QA plots for each Clusterer in its own output AIDA dir within the plot tree.
